channel.title: [562] Adding an ::update command[562]
channel.description:
does anyone have a code to the normal 60 second countdown for a system update?
ALSO IF ANYONE KNOWS HOW TO MAKE IT SO WHEN U DIE BY ANOTHER PLAYER YOU LOSE YOUR ITEMS THEN THAT WOULD BE AWESOME.
